id.description: Unique identifier for the payment gateway.

title.description: Title or name of the payment gateway.

description.description: A brief explanation of the payment gateway.

order.description: Order in which the payment gateway is displayed or processed.

enabled.description: Indicates if the payment gateway is currently enabled or disabled.

method_title.description: Title or name of the payment method.

method_description.description: Detailed information about the payment method.

method_supports.description: List of features or functionalities supported by the payment method.

settings.description: Configuration settings specific to the payment gateway.
